name: Bardi - Real Viking
description:
- 50 new levels
- New system of missions and new ways of earning stars
- New logic of Bardi’s development
- Special «Survival» mode is introduced
- Gameplay is refined
- Interface of the game is refined
- Many other innovations are introduced


THE STORY

For how many years have peaceful northerners suffered from attacks of different enemies. Rumor has it the enemy has come to the Northern land with the idea of plotting it. Our Hero, tired of these raids, decides to start a campaign to prevent the conquest of his land and defeat the enemy. And now it’s time to sharpen the axes and equip the wagon! It’s a long way ahead, moreover, local woods are filled with hostile guerrillas, but he’s not afraid of them. He is strong, wise, red-bearded mead lover. His name is Bardi and nothing can stop him!

Show everybody what you are capable of, save your land and prove that one angry northerner is worth a legion of enemies! Throw axes, improve your wagon, unleash the magic on your enemies, call for backup and save the country sheep! Bardi will face dozens of adversaries, interesting tasks, dangerous bosses and many other adventures. Go forward! Free the North!

Complete 50 different levels to destroy the conquerors. Choose one of 5 classes of Bardi and find your own fighting style. Using unique for each class features burn, freeze, crush and break down your enemies. Don’t forget to strengthen your wagon, upgrade your skills, and also don’t forget about the tamed dragon - the faithful friend of Bardi.

HOW TO PLAY

- Slide to throw an axe
- Use the money you earn to strengthen your defense
- Develop Bardi’s capabilities in between different levels
- Use the magic according to your class
- Try to avoid hitting the sheep
- Complete all missions
- Hone your skills in the «Survival» mode

Aren’t you tired of doing nothing?! Move toward adventures! Have a good fight, Northerner!
